Plugin.Details: This plugin provides detector for some common bugs

Detector.Details: we can not use System.out and System.err, please use log to output information

BugPattern.ShortDescription: code for publish can not use System.out
BugPattern.LongDescription: we can not use System.out and System.err, please use log to output information
BugPattern.Details: System.out and System.err are forbidden, please use log

Detector.Details: To ensure immutability, class which is annotated with @Immutable should be final. And all field in this class should be final too.

BugPattern.LongDescription: To prevent from bad extending, immutable class should be final.
BugPattern.Details: To prevent from bad extending, immutable class should be final.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Field of immutable class should be final.
BugPattern.LongDescription: Field ({1}) in class ({2}) should be final to make a class ({3}) immutable.
BugPattern.Details: Field of immutable class should be final.

Detector.Details: It is good to explain nullness of argument and returned value to help FindBugs detects potential problem.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Nullness of this parameter is unknown.
BugPattern.LongDescription: Nullness of this parameter is unknown.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Nullness of this returned value is unknown.
BugPattern.LongDescription: Nullness of this returned value is unknown.
BugPattern.Details: Nullness of this returned value is unknown.

Detector.Details: Oracle database has limitation for length of index name. We have to care this limitation when we make index.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Index name should be shorter than or equal to 30 bytes.
BugPattern.LongDescription: Index name should be shorter than or equal to 30 bytes.
BugPattern.Details: Index name should be shorter than or equal to 30 bytes.

Detector.Details: Oracle database has limitation for length of table name. We have to care this limitation when we make entity.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Table name should be shorter than or equal to 30 bytes.
BugPattern.LongDescription: Table name should be shorter than or equal to 30 bytes.
BugPattern.Details: Table name should be shorter than or equal to 30 bytes.

Detector.Details: Oracle database has limitation for length of column name. We have to care this limitation when we make entity.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Column name should be shorter than or equal to 30 bytes.
BugPattern.LongDescription: Column name should be shorter than or equal to 30 bytes.
BugPattern.Details: Column name should be shorter than or equal to 30 bytes.

Detector.Details: The default value of length element (255) might be not enough in some case. It is good to specify the value of length element clear, it tells that you have considered about it.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Specify length of column, its default (255) might be not enough.
BugPattern.LongDescription: Specify length of column, its default (255) might be not enough.
BugPattern.Details: Specify length of column, its default (255) might be not enough.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Specified length of column should be greater than 0, and smaller than 4,000 bytes.
BugPattern.LongDescription: Specified length of column ({1}) should be greater than 0, and smaller than 4,000 bytes.
BugPattern.Details: Specified length of column should be greater than 0, and smaller than 4,000 bytes.

Detector.Details: It is good to specify the value of nullable element clear, it tells that you have considered about it.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: It is good to specify the value of nullable element clear, it tells that you have considered about it.
BugPattern.LongDescription: It is good to specify the value of nullable element clear, it tells that you have considered about it.
BugPattern.Details: It is good to specify the value of nullable element clear, it tells that you have considered about it.

Detector.Details: To ensure that JPA entity does not depend on specific RDBMS, it is good to check existence of columnDefinition property.

BugPattern.LongDescription: @Column annotation has columnDefinition property, it might break RDBMS portability.
BugPattern.Details: @Column annotation has columnDefinition property, it might break RDBMS portability.

Detector.Details: This detector will find illegal nullable property of primitive type. When developer changes type of field from primitive type to reference type (ex. from int to Integer), he/she might forget to care about this property. This detector helps developer to find this human-error.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: Nullable property of primitive type should be false.
BugPattern.LongDescription: Nullable property of primitive type should be false.
BugPattern.Details: Nullable property of primitive type should be false.

Detector.Details: This detector will find ignored test case which has no explanation about why it is ignored.

BugPattern.ShortDescription: To tell why test case is ignored, put explanation as a parameter.
BugPattern.LongDescription: To tell why test case is ignored, put explanation as a parameter.
BugPattern.Details: To tell why test case is ignored, put explanation as a parameter.
